attributes.additional_details:
A petition for the banning of halal meat in the UK>

On the simple basisi 10,000 pubs closed since the introduction of the smoking ban.

Banning halal meat would similarly deter certain practices that are abhorant in the eyes of at least some (ie the undersigned) of the true british descended people and more than likely some of our more diverse cultures who too are opposed to this practice.
